verses.name: Job 23:12
verses.text: Neither have I gone back from the commandment of his lips; I have esteemed the words of his mouth more than my necessary food.

verses.name: Job 23:13
verses.text: But he is in one mind, and who can turn him? and what his soul desireth, even that he doeth.

verses.name: Job 23:14
verses.text: For he performeth the thing that is appointed for me: and many such things are with him.

verses.name: Job 23:15
verses.text: Therefore am I troubled at his presence: when I consider, I am afraid of him.

verses.name: Job 23:16
verses.text: For God maketh my heart soft, and the Almighty troubleth me:
